name: Every Breaking Wave
description: This song was performed on U2's recent tour in acoustic version, but the original is worth a listen. So good.

name: Acrobat
description: This lesser known hit from the Irishmen shows a depth that often is overlooked after so many hits.

name: Even Better Than The Real Thing
description: U2 took this remake of their hit song and it became a live staple on the 360 Tour.
